parallel.distributed

Class PDBTExecOnAllThreadsCmd

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.RRObject
      • parallel.distributed.PDBTExecCmd
        • parallel.distributed.PDBTExecOnAllThreadsCmd
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, TaskObject

    public abstract class PDBTExecOnAllThreadsCmd
extends PDBTExecCmd
implements TaskObject
    command for PDBTExecInited[Clt|Srv|Wrk] objects. Such commands are sent by clients, to servers, that must then forward them to every connected worker, who in turn ask their thread-pool to execute the object's run() method on each of its threads sequentially and atomically.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2017

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:
